title: Update profile picture from LinkedIn URL

requirements.summary: Replace the current profile photo in HeroSection with the new LinkedIn image saved as a local static asset
acceptanceCriteria: The new LinkedIn photo is saved as a local static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/
HeroSection.tsx references the new local asset as the profile picture src
The profile photo displayed in the hero section matches the provided LinkedIn image

file_operations.description: Update the profile photo src to reference the new generated asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/profile-photo.dim_400x400.png instead of the previous profile image. The generated image matches the LinkedIn photo provided by the user and replaces any previously set profile photo.
